scripts.ltd: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/ltd -c recipe.json > output.json
scripts.ltd-dry: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net --inspect-brk scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/ltd -c recipe.json -e dry > output.json
scripts.ltd-debug: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net --inspect-brk  scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/ltd -c recipe.json > output.json
scripts.led-eod: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/led-eod -c perform-eod.json > output.json
scripts.led-eod-dry: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/led-eod -c perform-eod.json -e dry > output.json
scripts.led-eod-debug: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net --inspect-brk  scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/led-eod -c perform-eod.json > output.json
scripts.led-eod-batch: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net --inspect-brk scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/led-eod -c batch-eod.json > output.json
scripts.led-eod-batch-dry: deno run --allow-env --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net scenario-black-box.ts -w black-box-tests/led-eod -c batch-eod.json -e dry > output.json
